wiki.summary: On “Love Again,” The Kid LAROI portrays what a toxic love-hate relationship looks like. A cycle of regret, splitting apart, wanting to rekindle, and wondering if it’s actually the end. The song was first previewed on Laroi’s Instagram live on August 25, 2022. On December 25, 2022, the track leaked in its entirety. This track serves as the lead single to Laroi’s debut album, THE FIRST TIME. During the week ending February 11, 2023, the song debuted at #40 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On “Love Again,” The Kid LAROI portrays what a toxic love-hate relationship looks like. A cycle of regret, splitting apart, wanting to rekindle, and wondering if it’s actually the end. The song was first previewed on Laroi’s Instagram live on August 25, 2022. On December 25, 2022, the track leaked in its entirety. This track serves as the lead single to Laroi’s debut album, THE FIRST TIME. During the week ending February 11, 2023, the song debuted at #40 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. The song has peaked at #16 on the UK Singles chart, as well as #6 on Australia’s ARIA chart. Read more on Last.fm.
